Insurtech Committee

Insurtech is exploring avenues that largue insurance firms have less incentive to exploit, such as offering ultra-customized policies, social insurance, and using new streams of data from Internet-enabled devices to dynamically price premiums according to observed behavior. This field is ripe for innovation. It would be helpful (not enforced) if you meet the following requirements:

  • 1.   CS61A or equivalent
  • 2.   Data 8 or Jupyter Notebook familiarity
  • 3.   Interest in Natural Language Processing
  • 4.   Passion for learning and teamwork

As part of the Fintech community, we aim to create a close-knit community of members interested in Insurtech from all disciplines. We plan to create our own chatbot which uses input from the user and calculates their insurance rate based on their activities.

Tentative Schedule

Module One -- Current Technical Models
Module Two -- Human/ Social Factors
Module Three -- ML Speaker Event
Module Four -- Chatbot Tech
